meta.fee_euro_approx: 60 EUR (Single Entry) / 100 EUR (Multi Entry) + VFS Charges
meta.min_funds_requirement: No fixed amount, but must show sufficient funds for duration

documents.title: Application Summary Sheet
documents.description: Signed summary sheet from the AVATS online system.

documents.title: Application Letter
documents.description: Signed letter explaining why you want to visit, dates, and commitment to obey rules.

documents.title: Financial Documents
documents.description: 6 months detailed bank statements. Lump sum lodgements must be explained.

documents.title: Accommodation Plan
documents.description: Hotel bookings or invitation letter from host.

documents.title: Travel Insurance
documents.description: Medical insurance covering at least 25,000 EUR (recommended, though sometimes not strictly asked at submission, mandatory for entry).

steps_flow.title: Apply Online (AVATS)
steps_flow.description: Complete the online application on the AVATS system.

steps_flow.title: Pay Fees
steps_flow.description: Pay the visa fee via VFS or as instructed.

steps_flow.title: Book Appointment
steps_flow.description: Schedule an appointment at VFS Global (Ireland).

steps_flow.title: Submit Application
steps_flow.description: Submit passport and all supporting documents. Ireland requires physical submission of all docs.
